schedule.recurrenceDateValidation: Some months have fewer than the selected date. For these months, the occurrence will fall on the last date of the month.
schedule.sameDayAlert: Two occurrences of the same event cannot occur on the same day.
schedule.startEndError: The selected end date occurs before the start date.
schedule.invalidDateError: The entered date value is invalid.
